title: Intel Rallies After Forecast Signals a Comeback Is Underway
description: Intel Corp. shares surged after the chipmaker returned to profitability and gave an upbeat revenue forecast, suggesting that it’s making progress on a long and challenging comeback attempt.

title: Tesla Profits Fall Despite Record Sales | Bloomberg Tech 10/23/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss the plunge in Tesla’s profits that came despite record vehicle sales and the ongoing debate around the proposed trillion dollar pay package for Elon Musk. Plus, the White House says it may impose broad software restrictions against China, as the country pushes for tech self-reliance. And T-Mobile’s incoming CEO Srini Gopalan discusses the company’s third quarter earnings as it adds one million new mobile phone subscribers. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: YouTube TV Customers Risk Losing Access to Disney’s ESPN and ABC
description: Walt Disney Co.’s ESPN and ABC channels are at risk of going dark on Alphabet Inc.’s YouTube TV service when a deal between the two companies expires next week.
